thread.title: Paul Scholes reveals the player Jose Mourinho has to keep at Manchester United
thread.title_full: Paul Scholes reveals the player Jose Mourinho has to keep at Manchester United

title: Paul Scholes reveals the player Jose Mourinho has to keep at Manchester United
text:
Man Utd via Getty Images 1 of 12 Who impressed for Manchester United against Blackburn? GETTY Michael Carrick impressed as Manchester United beat Blackburn 
"Michael will be a big miss," Scholes told Republik of Mancunia . 
"I hope he’ll get another year. 
"He’s been a sensational player for this club. GETTY Zlatan Ibrahimovic scored the winner as Manchester United beat Blackburn 
"He doesn’t always get the praise that he deserves really because of the job he does, but the job he does is appreciated so much by the players around him." 
Carrick could feature when United go up against Saint-Etienne in the Europa League on Wednesday (5pm). 
The Red Devils are aiming to book their place in the last 16 of the competition and lead 3-0 from the first leg. Related articles
